All,

Jumping in here - we've made a decision to remove pricing from the website and treat orders like any of our other products. This is in line with maintaining this as a B2B strategy rather than attempting a B2C strategy without the proper planning and campaign in place.

@Heath thanks for all your hard work on the backend but could we please remove pricing and instead add an 'order request' form to the website instead, which filters through to customercare.au@acoufelt.com.

Thanks!

Warm regards,

Lucy Pittman

Subject: Table Dividers AUS - UDPATE


Hello All,

To summarise where we are at with getting the Table Dividers onto WooCommerce the eCommerce platform of our website, I have listed the activity below so we are all on the same page to deliver this product;

Table Dividers Production
  • Zeljko producing the table dividers in Sydney (Select Group)
  • Cable hole to be applied to back panel
  • Looking into Acoufelt logo laser cut
  • Various colours available sourcing from Mel and GMK stocks
  • Requires a shipper carton to be sourced
  • Feltech have also been given CAD drawings and could produce

Price
  • Phil finalising, potential to be $99.99

Sendle - Courier service
  • Heath has integrated Sendle with WooCommerce
  • Sarah Meyers has read T&C's and no fees for Premium Account. No fees to pay until we get our first order
  • Label is automatically created for order, and requires printing and adhering to shipper carton

Marketing Assets
  • Heath, Leah & Lucy are working on new photos from Heath in different colours and settings
  • Spec sheets & install guide completed
  • Product pages close to going live on website


At your complete disposal.


Warm Regards,

Karina Deboar
Product Development Manager

t +61 1800.62.64.62 m +61 447.490.047
Level 4 108 King William Street Adelaide SA 5000
acoufelt.com
